This is actually an island disconnected
from the shore. Men have built a bridge

connecting the islet to the coast. If
you look at the coast

it is tirelessly smashed by waves. All
day and all night, and what happens is

eventually those waves carve out
archways, caves, interesting features into

the shore. That's part of why this area
is so interesting.
